name: Bloodclump
description:
A game about slicing evil knights using your sword. Keep an eye on your sword, when it gets too bloody it cant cut them anymore. Keep it clean by walking to holy water sources and pressing E to clean it. This will corrupt the holy water though, increasing enemy spawn rates nearby.

Controls: 

WASD: Move around

CTRL: Sprint

Mouse: Look around/Rotate character

LMB: Hit with sword (Time correctly to execute combo)

E: (Near Holy water location) Clean Sword

GORE WARNING
There is some blood and heads falling off.
